DESCRIPTION:
The supersized city-builder 

Design, build, and manage the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s largest and most diverse cities in Cities XXL. Bigger and better than ever before with a more powerful game engine and new interface, become the mayor of your very own sprawling metropolis. With town-planning including home locations, retail plots, offices, industry and infrastructure across 47 architectural styles and 1000+ buildings, manage the happiness of your cityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s denizens, with leisure activities, landmarks, and ecology and pollution management. With new structures, but also all-new ecological buildings and upgrades, such as the park-and-ride, electric car dealership, and bike hire, Cities XXL offers a greener approach! 

Manage the economy by sharing resources between all of your cities across over 65 maps (including new landscapes and environments) throughout the Ã¢â‚¬ËœCities PlanetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢: trade anything from waste management to oil, fuel, and water Ã¢â‚¬â€œ even holidaymakers and workers. Finally, create, share and download user crafted content via the Steam Workshop Ã¢â‚¬â€œ an endless supply of user-curated content. From scenic villages to economic powerhouses, build, manage, and grow the city of your dreams in Cities XXL. 

* 1000+ unique-looking buildings to bring your city to life 
* 47 Architectural styles from many different cultures around the world 
* NEW: Over 65 varied landscapes including 5 new environments to develop on, from snowy alps to green meadows and seaside resorts 
* NEW: A powerful and improved game engine for an experience that stretches your city to the limits 
* Fine management of road traffic and public transportation networks (buses, railways) 
* NEW: New Ã¢â‚¬ËœgreenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ options such as industrial building upgrades, and all-new ecological structures like the park & ride bus company and bicycle rental services
